title: FONT ID- OBEY fonts
content:
Hi guys, can anyone help me out with these. They look like the same family, I’ve found something similar but it doesn’t really cut it. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040827im_/http:/typophile.com/files/obey-metropark-contest_4719.jpg)
author: hudini16

comments.content:
This is the sort of thing Letterhead Fonts makes a specialty of. Did you look there?

Font Mesa’s [Broadgauge Ornate](http://web.archive.org/web/20090713040827/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/broadgauge-ornate/) is somewhat like OBEY, but there are two other fonts in your sample too.

- Mike Yanega
YES! Thanks so much Mike, there’s a couple on that site that are almost identical.
